definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The fluid load in pipeline is calculated, that is calculating the pressure distribution of pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 计算管线内部流体荷载，也就是管系的压力分布计算。

sentences.english: What is the installation elevation of this pipeline?
sentences.chinese: 这条管线的安置标高是多少？

sentences.english: Fluid entering the by-pass line is recirculated through the pump.
sentences.chinese: 进入旁通管线的液体通过泵循环。

sentences.english: Based on a method of positioning by the nodule of pipeline, various pipeline laying can be conveniently realized.
sentences.chinese: 提出的管头定位法有利于各种复杂要求的管线铺设。

sentences.english: Jets of water kept coming out of the broken pipe. Even the street had to be closed.
sentences.chinese: 管线破掉，不断地喷出水柱，连街道都必须封锁了。

sentences.english: Description is also made concerning the instrument and equipment for line pipe detection and their application of effects.
sentences.chinese: 对管线探测仪器设备及应用效果作了介绍。

sentences.english: The system algorithm is designed for pipeline's cross and lengthwise section.
sentences.chinese: 算法设计是为解决管线的横纵剖面图而设计的。

sentences.english: It analyses the few attention issues applied in grade X80 pipeline steel.
sentences.chinese: 分析了X80级管线钢应用中应关注的几个问题。

sentences.english: Compensating unit should be provided when wires thread through settlement joint and expansion joint of building.
sentences.chinese: 电气管线穿过建筑物的沉降和伸缩缝采用补偿装置。

sentences.english: The Xuyi Huaihe River Bridge is a bridge combined with pipeline and road in Lu-Ning Oil Pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宁管线上的盱眙淮河大桥是管桥结合的一座桥。

sentences.english: A device installed in a pump manifold or treating line to measure the fluid flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 安装在泵的管汇或处理管线中用于测量流量的装置。

sentences.english: The main reason for corrosion of oil pipelines in Qinghai oil field has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了青海油田集输管线腐蚀的主要原因。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the applications of GPS (Global Positioning System) to the long-distance pipeline project.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究GPS技术在长输管线工程中的应用。

sentences.english: These Procedures apply to the protection of aviation gasoline pipelines and related administrative activities.
sentences.chinese: 本办法适用于航油管线的保护及其相关的管理活动。

sentences.english: Any lines or pipe under pressure should not be hammered on.
sentences.chinese: 不能用𨱍头砸带压力的任何管线。

sentences.english: The residual intensity assessment of the pipelines is one of the main content on pipeline integrality assessment.
sentences.chinese: 管线剩余强度评价是管道完整性评价的主要内容之一。

definition: construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
to lay (railroad tracks, carpet, pipeline)/to install (wiring, cable)/to construct (road, concrete slab)
